required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Assess the Relative Bioavailability and Effect of Food on the Coated Granule Formulation of Mitapivat in Healthy Participants
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1, Open-label, Randomized 4-period Crossover Study to Assess the Relative Bioavailability and Effect of Food on the Coated Granule Formulation of Mitapivat in Healthy Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this study is to assess the relative bioavailability of the mitapivat coated granule formulation compared to the tablet formulation following a single oral dose of mitapivat under fasted conditions in healthy adult participants.

primary_outcome.measure: Maximum Observed Concentration (Cmax) of Mitapivat Under Fasted Conditions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve from Time Zero to Last Quantifiable Concentration (AUC0-t) of Mitapivat Under Fasted Conditions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve from Time Zero to Infinity (AUC0-∞) of Mitapivat Under Fasted Conditions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

primary_outcome.measure: Time to Reach Maximum Observed Concentration (Tmax) of Mitapivat Under Fasted Conditions
primary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of Mitapivat Under Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-t of Mitapivat Under Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC0-∞ of Mitapivat Under Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of Mitapivat Under Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Relative Bioavailability (Frel) Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve from Time Zero to Twelve Hours (AUC0-12) of Mitapivat Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Plasma Terminal Elimination Half-life (t½) of Mitapivat Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Total Plasma Clearance (CL/F) of Mitapivat Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Volume of Distribution (Vz/F) of Mitapivat Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Apparent Terminal Elimination Rate Constant (λz) of Mitapivat Under Fasted and Fed Conditions
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Pre-dose and multiple time points post-dose (up to 72 hours)

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Event (AEs)
Number of Participants With AEs, Graded by Severity
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Clinical Laboratory Values
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Findings for 12-lead Electrocardiogram (ECG) Parameters
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Findings for Vital Signs Parameters
Number of Participants With Clinically Significant Abnormal Physical Examination Findings

arm_group.description: Participants will receive Treatment A (mitapivat tablet, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 1) followed by Treatment B (mitapivat coated granules, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 2) followed by Treatment C (mitapivat coated granules, with a strawberry yogurt, orally once on Day 1 of Period 3) followed by Treatment D (mitapivat coated granules, with a chocolate pudding, orally once on Day 1 of Period 4). Each Treatment Period will be separated by a Washout Period of 7 days.

Participants will receive Treatment B (mitapivat coated granules, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 1) followed by Treatment D (mitapivat coated granules, with a chocolate pudding, orally once on Day 1 of Period 2) followed by Treatment A (mitapivat tablet, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 3) followed by Treatment C (mitapivat coated granules, with a strawberry yogurt, orally once on Day 1 of Period 4). Each Treatment Period will be separated by a Washout Period of 7 days.

Participants will receive Treatment C (mitapivat coated granules, with a strawberry yogurt, orally once on Day 1 of Period 1) followed by Treatment A (mitapivat tablet, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 2) followed by Treatment D (mitapivat coated granules, with a chocolate pudding, orally once on Day 1 of Period 3) followed by Treatment B (mitapivat coated granules, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 4). Each Treatment Period will be separated by a Washout Period of 7 days.

Participants will receive Treatment D (mitapivat coated granules, with a chocolate pudding, orally once on Day 1 of Period 1) followed by Treatment C (mitapivat coated granules, with a strawberry yogurt, orally once on Day 1 of Period 2) followed by Treatment B (mitapivat coated granules, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 3) followed by Treatment A (mitapivat tablet, orally, under fasted conditions once on Day 1 of Period 4). Each Treatment Period will be separated by a Washout Period of 7 days.
